name: PAT_HM_CUR_GUIDE
description: Health Maintenance Plans used during patient's last health maintenance update.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HM_CURRENT_GUIDE_ID
columns.description: Current Health Maintenance Plans the patient is a part of.

columns.name: HM_CURRENT_GUIDE_ID_HM_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Health Maintenance Plan record.
